text: Then we went to work on Coleridge Taylor's 'Hiawatha's Wedding Feast.' Enthusiasm village schoolmaster, and the tenor solo 'Onaway awake' was sung by the Rector. Friends from Limpsfield, in addition to the villagers, came up, and we were all happy.
